Name: Affect
Description: This broad category captures everything from being sickened to refugees, evacuations, displaced persons, stranded, etc

Name: Arrest
Description: Discussion of someone being arrested, detained, jailed, imprisoned, etc

Name: Displaced
Description: This category counts mentions of people being displaced - see REFUGEES for counts of refugees, forced migration, and related

Name: Kidnap
Description: Someone being kidnapped, abducted, hostages, etc

Name: Protest
Description: Discussion of protesting, demonstrating, rioting, striking, activists, agitators, etc

Name: Refugees
Description: Refugees, displaced persons, forced migration, asylum seekers

Name: Seize
Description: Something being seized (often drugs, illegal materials, etc)

Name: Sickened
Description: This category counts anything being sickened

Name: Wound
Description: Any mention of something being wounded or injured

Name: Taxonomy Drug Cartels
Description: Returns any mention of a major recognized drug cartel

Name: Taxonomy Infectiuos Disease
Description: Returns any mention of a major infectious disease

Name: Taxonomy Ethnicity
Description: Returns any mention of a major ethnicity from around the world (expands CAMEOETH)

Name: Taxonomy Functional Actor
Description: Returns any mention of a "functional actor", which is essentially a "role" from a "child" to a "burgler" to get a better understanding of the specific roles of people involved

Name: Taxonomy Food Staples
Description: Captures a cross-section of major food staples like bread, rice, etc

Name: Taxonomy Military Title
Description: Returns any mention of a major military title such as Captain, 1st Lieutenant, etc

Name: Taxonomy Political Party
Description: Returns any mention of a major recognized political party around the world

Name: Taxonomy Religion
Description: Returns any mention of a major religion from around the world (expands CAMEOREL)

Name: Taxonomy Special Issues
Description: Returns mentions of special issues such as certain major laws and will eventually be replaced by a new tracking system for those

Name: Taxonomy Special Death
Description: Special kinds of death such as beheadings

Name: Taxonomy Terror Group
Description: Returns any mention of a major recognized terror group around the world

Name: Action Force Posture
Description: Actions relating to changes in force posture

Name: Action Harm or Threaten
Description: Actions relating to harming or threatening

Name: Action Make Statement
Description: Actions relating to making a statement

Name: Alliance
Description: Self-identified discussion of alliances and coalitions

Name: Appointment
Description: An appointment of someone to something

Name: Armedconflict
Description: Primary discussion of armed conflict, from ground assaults to air raids

Name: Ban
Description: Something being banned, prohibited, outlawed, criminalized, etc

Name: Black Market
Description: Actual mentions of "black market", not related terms

Name: Blockade
Description: Mentions of blockades and no fly zones - use in combination with the military themes to distinguish armed vs non-kinetic blockades

Name: Ceasefire
Description: Mentions of ceasefires, truces, peace deals, suspension of hostilities, etc

Name: Claim Credit
Description: Claims of responsibility or credit, for good (claimed credit for the success) and bad (claimed credit for the bombing)

Name: Closure
Description: Discussion of closure other than road, bridge, street, closure (ie, facility closure, military base closure, etc)

Name: Confiscation
Description: Actual mention of confiscation in the text

Name: Crime Cartels
Description: Primarily focused around mentions of drug cartels, drug corridors, etc. Does not currently have a list of cartels, just captures general discussion of them

Name: Crime Common Robbery
Description: Discussion of general crime like pickpocketing, robbery, street criminals, etc

Name: Cyber Attack
Description: Any discussion of cyberwarfare, cyberattacks, phishing, hacking, hacktivists, viruses, etc

Name: Death Penalty
Description: From general discussion of capital punishment to actual mentions of death sentences

Name: Defection
Description: Any discussion of defection or defectors

Name: Drug Trade
Description: General discussion of the drug trade in broad terms - broader than the other categories

Name: Economic Cost Of Living
Description: Explicit mention of "cost of living", "median wage", etc

Name: Economic Currency Exchange Rate
Description: Exchange rates, foreign exchange, forex, currency fluctuation, etc

Name: Economic Currency Reserves
Description: Currency reserves, forex reserves, dollar and euro reserves, etc

Name: Economic Entrepreneurship
Description: Entrepreneurship, venture capital, seed funding, angel investors, etc

Name: Economic Housing Prices
Description: Housing prices, real estate, and other explicit discussion of property

Name: Economic Interest Rates
Description: Interest rates, benchmark rates, overnight rates, libor, etc

Name: Economic Mou
Description: Relating to a Memorandum of Understanding

Name: Economic Nationalize
Description: Discussion of nationalization of industry, etc

Name: Economic Stockmarket
Description: Any discussion of a stockmarket, NYSE, FTSE, etc, also discussion of government bonds, etc

Name: Economic Unions
Description: Discussion of unions, unionization, shop stewards, etc

Name: Education
Description: Teachers, schools, madrassas, yeshivas, professors, education in general

Name: Election Fraud
Description: Election fraud, from ballot stuffing to vote rigging

Name: Enviroment Climatechange
Description: Discussion of climate change and global warming

Name: Enviroment Fishery
Description: Discussion of fisheries and fish hatcheries

Name: Enviroment Metals
Description: Core metals like gold, platinum, silver, copper, iron

Name: Enviroment Naturalgas
Description: Natural gas for power and heating

Name: Enviroment Nuclearpower
Description: Nuclear power for energy generation (excludes nuclear weapons)

Name: Exhumation
Description: Discussion of mass graves, exhumation, unearthing of bodies, human remains, etc

Name: Exile
Description: Actual mention of exile in the text

Name: Extremism
Description: Discussion of extremists, both political (farright/farleft/anarchist), groups like skinheads, and terms like zealot, "fringe element", etc

Name: Food Security
Description: Famine, food crisis, malnourishment, food prices

Name: Food Staple
Description: Captures explicit mention of terms like "food staple"

Name: General Government
Description: General discussion of government, congress, parliament, republic, regime, etc

Name: General Health
Description: Any general discussion of human, animal, plant, etc health, from hygiene to hospitals, doctors to disease

Name: Grievances
Description: Mention of the term "grievances" as explicit discussion of societal unhappiness.

Name: Hate Speech
Description: Explicit mention of the phrase "hate speech"

Name: Health Pandemic
Description: Explicit mention in the text of a pandemic or public health emergency

Name: Human Trafficking
Description: Human trafficking, sexual slavery, prostitution, human smuggling, etc

Name: Infrastructure Bad Roads
Description: Mentions of potholes, impassable roads, blocked roads, etc.

Name: Internet Censorship
Description: Internet censorship such as blocking websites, etc

Name: Leader
Description: Political elites, such as lawmakers, presidents, supreme leaders, etc

Name: Legalize
Description: Something being legalized, laws being repealed, etc

Name: Lgbt
Description: Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, and Transgender discussion

Name: Manmade Disaster
Description: Failure of manmade infrastructure such as car crashes, bridge collapses, derailments, plane crashes, etc

Name: Manmade Disaster Implied
Description: Discussion of disasters in context with manmade structures, but where the relationship is not fully clear, but is implied

Name: Maritime
Description: General discussion of the maritime environment

Name: Maritime Incident Implied
Description: Maritime emergencies like sinking ships, collisions at sea, etc

Name: Maritime Incident Self Identified
Description: Mentions of specific unambiguous martime accidents like grounding.

Name: Media Censorship
Description: Censorship of the mainstream media, such as arresting journalists, press freedoms, etc

Name: Media Msm
Description: Any mention of mainstream media such as television, reporter, journalist, etc. Often flags just a mention of a "reporter", but can be used to capture discussion of MSM overall

Name: Media Social
Description: Any mention of social media such as Facebook, Twitter, etc. Often flags mentions of "follow me on twitter", but useful proxy for discussion of social media

Name: Medical
Description: More narrowly focused on healthcare like nurses, health services, addiction treatment, etc

Name: Medical Security
Description: Access to doctors, healthcare, poor medical access, etc.

Name: Mil Self Identified Arms Deal
Description: Only actual mentions of "arms deal", "weapons sale", etc - doesn't determine that a sale of AK47's is an arms sale, requires the text to explicitly label it as such

Name: Military Cooperation
Description: Actual mentions of military ties, military aid, defense cooperation, etc (where the text explicitly labels it as such)

Name: Movement General
Description: General discussion of movements, activists, etc

Name: Movement Other
Description: Catchall for movements such as equality movements, religious movements, youth movements, labor movements, etc

Name: Natural Disaster
Description: From floods to coldsnaps, wildfires to tornadoes

Name: New Construction
Description: Mentions of new construction, new roads, etc

Name: Organized Crime
Description: Discussion of gangs, mafia, organized crime, etc

Name: Peacekeeping
Description: Mentions of peacekeepers, UN forces, etc

Name: Piracy
Description: Piracy, hijacking, etc (but not software/music/etc piracy)

Name: Political Prisoner
Description: Explicit mention of political prisoners or labor camps

Name: Political Turmoil
Description: Discussion of major unrest such as martial law, political "crisis", state of emergency, violent supression, etc.

Name: Power Outage
Description: Mentions of power failures - these are also captured under MANMADE_DISASTER, but are broken out here so that they can be specifically selected

Name: Property Rights
Description: Discussion of property rights, land tenure, eminent domain, land confiscation

Name: Public Transport
Description: Public transportation from buses to subways

Name: Rape
Description: Rape, sexual slavery, sex crime, etc

Name: Ratify
Description: Mention of something actually being adopted, signed into law, ratified, etc

Name: Relations
Description: Narrow focus on "improving relations", "restarting talks", "bilateral talks", etc

Name: Religion
Description: Just mention of terms like "religion" or "secular", not actual religions

Name: Retirement
Description: Any mention of "retirement" (not "retiring", etc) or pensions.

Name: Sanitation
Description: Any mention related to sanitation, toilets, etc

Name: Scandal
Description: Mention of scandal, disgraced, etc, where it has been self-identified in the text as a scandal

Name: Science
Description: Just mentions of scientist, researcher, invention, innovation, scientific discovery, etc

Name: Security Services
Description: Discussion of primarily internal security services like police, law enforcement, secret police, and also peacekeepers

Name: Self Identified Atrocity
Description: Only captures atrocities identified as such in the text (atrocity, genocide, war crime, etc), not actions that could be construed as a crime, but where the text does not draw that distinction

Name: Self Identified Environ Disaster
Description: Articles where the text explicitly mentions "ecological disaster", "environmental catastrophe", etc

Name: Self Identified Human Rights
Description: Mentions of "human rights", "political freedom", "religious freedom", "freedom of speech", etc - only explicit mentions where the text explicitly identified a human rights issue

Name: Self Identified Humanitarian Crisis
Description: Humanitarian crises, aid, disasters, disaster relief, etc

Name: Shortage
Description: Shortages, blackouts, brownouts, rationing, etc of anything

Name: Self Identified Mineral Resources
Description: Self-identified discussion of mineral wealth, mineral resources, mineral exports

Name: Self Identified Rule Of Law
Description: Self-identified discussion of rule of law

Name: Smuggling
Description: Smuggling of anything, including arms traficking

Name: Eexpress Support
Description: Expressing support for a person, action, or similar

Name: Sovereignty
Description: Actual mentions of "sovereignty", "proclaim independence", "independent state", etc

Name: State Of Emergency
Description: Martial law, state of emergency, emergency rule, etc

Name: Strike
Description: Strikes, work stoppages, lock outs, etc

Name: Take Office
Description: Mention of someone taking office either through force or through normal channels (took office, seized office, etc)

Name: Terror
Description: Primary discussion of terrorists, bombings, assasinations, etc

Name: Torture
Description: Just mentions of the term "torture", not actual torture techniques like waterboarding

Name: Tourism
Description: Actual mentions of "tourism", "tourists", etc, not related terms

Name: Transparency
Description: Any mention of transparency or accountability.

Name: Trial
Description: Trail, courts, judges, lawyers, lawsuits, etc

Name: Unsafe Work Environment
Description: Work injuries, killed on the job, working conditions, etc.

Name: Violent Unrest
Description: Discussion of violent unrest, from rubber bullets, firing into a crowd, clashes with police or soldiers, violent rioting, etc

Name: Water Security
Description: Drought, water access, lack of rain, clean water, etc

Name: Weapons of Mass Distruction
Description: Weapons of mass distruction, from nuclear to biological to chemical warfare
